 1 <?php
 2 
 3 App::uses('CrudAction', 'Crud.Controller/Crud');
 4 
 5 /**
 6  * Handles 'View' Crud actions
 7  *
 8  * Licensed under The MIT License
 9  * For full copyright and license information, please see the LICENSE.txt
10  */
11 class ViewCrudAction extends CrudAction {
12 
13 /**
14  * Default settings for 'view' actions
15  *
16  * `enabled` Is this crud action enabled or disabled
17  *
18  * `findMethod` The default `Model::find()` method for reading data
19  *
20  * `view` A map of the controller action and the view to render
21  * If `NULL` (the default) the controller action name will be used
22  *
23  * @var array
24  */
25     protected $_settings = array(
26         'enabled' => true,
27         'findMethod' => 'first',
28         'view' => null,
29         'viewVar' => null,
30         'serialize' => array()
31     );
32 
33 /**
34  * Constant representing the scope of this action
35  *
36  * @var integer
37  */
38     const ACTION_SCOPE = CrudAction::SCOPE_RECORD;
39 
40 /**
41  * Change the name of the view variable name
42  * of the data when its sent to the view
43  *
44  * @param mixed $method
45  * @return mixed
46  */
47     public function viewVar($name = null) {
48         if (empty($name)) {
49             return $this->config('viewVar') ?: Inflector::variable($this->_model()->name);
50         }
51 
52         return $this->config('viewVar', $name);
53     }
54 
55 /**
56  * HTTP GET handler
57  *
58  * @throws NotFoundException If record not found
59  * @param string $id
60  * @return void
61  */
62     protected function _get($id = null) {
63         if (!$this->_validateId($id)) {
64             return false;
65         }
66 
67         $model = $this->_model();
68 
69         $query = array();
70         $query['conditions'] = array($model->escapeField() => $id);
71 
72         $findMethod = $this->_getFindMethod('first');
73         $subject = $this->_trigger('beforeFind', compact('id', 'query', 'findMethod'));
74 
75         $item = $model->find($subject->findMethod, $subject->query);
76 
77         if (empty($item)) {
78             $this->_trigger('recordNotFound', compact('id'));
79 
80             $message = $this->message('recordNotFound', array('id' => $id));
81             $exceptionClass = $message['class'];
82             throw new $exceptionClass($message['text'], $message['code']);
83         }
84 
85         $success = true;
86         $viewVar = $this->viewVar();
87 
88         $subject = $this->_trigger('afterFind', compact('id', 'viewVar', 'success', 'item'));
89 
90         $this->_controller()->set(array('success' => $subject->success, $subject->viewVar => $subject->item));
91         $this->_trigger('beforeRender', $subject);
92     }
93 
94 }
95
